page.title: 16Living in Norbury
page.content: I live in a quiet,residential area which consists mainly of semi-detached houses,some of which are council owned. Many of the streets are quite attractive being lined with trees which is pleasant in the summer. I do not have to travel far to school since there are two to choose from in the area and they are both lucky enough to have large playing fields attached to them. In the summer I enjoy playing in Norbury Park which is very close to my parents' allotment. Or sometimes my friends and I travel along Green Lane to the large sports ground where we can play tennis. If I want to go shopping I have to travel into Croydon because there are only a couple of food shops in the neighbour- hood. It can be too quiet living here sometimes.
